title: Tomotaka Okamoto (footballer)
text:
is a <a href="Japanese%20people">Japanese</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player currently playing for <a href="Roasso%20Kumamoto">Roasso Kumamoto</a>.
National team career.
In August 2007, Okamoto was elected <a href="Japan%20national%20under-17%20football%20team">Japan U-17 national team</a> for <a href="2007%20FIFA%20U-17%20World%20Cup">2007 U-17 World Cup</a>. He played full time in all 3 matches as defensive midfielder and scored an opening goal against <a href="Haiti%20national%20under-17%20football%20team">Haiti</a> in first match.
Career statistics.
"Updated to 23 February 2018".
National team career statistics.
As of 8 November 2008
